abstract: In Time Warner Cable’s biggest acquisition since 2006, it has reached a deal for Insight Communications, a person with knowledge of the deal said.
snippet: In Time Warner Cable’s biggest acquisition since 2006, it has reached a deal for Insight Communications, a person with knowledge of the deal said.
lead_paragraph: Time Warner Cable, the second biggest cable television company in the United States after Comcast, is near a deal to acquire Insight Communications, a large operator in the Midwest, for about $3 billion, a person with knowledge of the deal said on Sunday night.

headline.main: Time Warner Cable Is Said to Acquire Midwest Cable Operator
headline.print_headline: Time Warner Is Expected To Announce Cable Merger
